3 area::area ()
4 {
5  // read parameters
6  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/cell_warn", cell_warn, 1000);
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/resolution", resolution, 1.0);
8 
9  // init map publisher
10  int queue_size;
11  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
12  map_publisher = nh.advertise<nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid>("area/map", queue_size, true);
13 
14  // subscribe to map
15  map_exists = false;
16  map_subscriber = nh.subscribe("map", queue_size, &area::map_callback, this);
17 
18  // wait a bit to see if there is a map provided by another node
19  double loop_rate;
20  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/loop_rate", loop_rate, 1.0);
21  Rate rate(loop_rate);
22  double wait_for_map;
23  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/wait_for_map", wait_for_map, 2.0);
24  Time start = Time::now();
25  while (ok() && Time::now() < start + Duration(wait_for_map)) {
26  spinOnce();
27  rate.sleep();
28  }
29 
30  // if there is no map, initialize area from coordinates
31  if (map_exists == false)
32  init_area();
33 }

35 bool area::closest_bound (cpswarm_msgs::ClosestBound::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::ClosestBound::Response &res)
36 {
37  // use origin
38  if (req.point.x == 0 && req.point.y == 0) {
39  req.point.x = origin.x;
40  req.point.y = origin.y;
41  }
42 
43  // find minimal distance to any area bound
44  for (int i = 0; i < coords.size(); ++i) {
45  // coordinates of two neighboring polygon points
46  geometry_msgs::Point p1;
47  p1.x = coords[i].x;
48  p1.y = coords[i].y;
49  geometry_msgs::Point p2;
50  p2.x = coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].x;
51  p2.y = coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].y;
52 
53  // minimal distance to line connecting the two points
54  double dist = abs((p2.y - p1.y) * req.point.x - (p2.x - p1.x) * req.point.y + p2.x * p1.y - p2.y * p1.x) / hypot(p2.x - p1.x, p2.y - p1.y);
55 
56  // found smaller distance
57  if (res.dist == 0 || dist < res.dist) {
58  // return indexes
59  res.index.clear();
60  res.index.push_back(i);
61  res.index.push_back((i+1) % coords.size());
62 
63  // return actual coordinates
64  res.coords.clear();
65  res.coords.push_back(p1);
66  res.coords.push_back(p2);
67 
68  // return distance
69  res.dist = dist;
70  }
71  }
72 
73  return true;
74 }

76 bool area::get_area (cpswarm_msgs::GetPoints::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetPoints::Response &res)
77 {
78  res.points = coords;
79  return true;
80 }

82 bool area::get_center (cpswarm_msgs::GetPoint::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetPoint::Response &res)
83 {
84  // compute centroid / barycenter
85  for (auto c : coords) {
86  res.point.x += c.x;
87  res.point.y += c.y;
88  }
89  res.point.x /= coords.size();
90  res.point.y /= coords.size();
91  return true;
92 }
93 
94 nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid area::get_gridmap ()
95 {
96  // no map existing yet, i.e., no map server
97  if (map_exists == false) {
98  // get coordinates
99  double xmin = numeric_limits<double>::max();
100  double xmax = numeric_limits<double>::min();
101  double ymin = numeric_limits<double>::max();
102  double ymax = numeric_limits<double>::min();
103  for (auto p : coords) {
104  if (p.x < xmin)
105  xmin = p.x;
106  if (p.x > xmax)
107  xmax = p.x;
108  if (p.y < ymin)
109  ymin = p.y;
110  if (p.y > ymax)
111  ymax = p.y;
112  }
113  int x = int(ceil((xmax - xmin) / resolution));
114  int y = int(ceil((ymax - ymin) / resolution));
115 
116  // warn about large grids
117  if (x*y > cell_warn)
118  ROS_WARN("Given coordinates seem wrong, grid map extremley large: %d cells!", x*y);
119 
120  // generate grid map data
121  cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Request req;
122  cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Response res;
123  vector<int8_t> data;
124  for (int i=0; i<y; ++i) { // row major order
125  for (int j=0; j<x; ++j) {
126  // check if cell is within area
127  req.pose.position.x = j * resolution + xmin;
128  req.pose.position.y = i * resolution + ymin;
129  out_of_bounds(req, res);
130 
131  // out of bounds
132  if (res.out)
133  data.push_back(100); // occupied
134 
135  // inside area
136  else
137  data.push_back(0); // free
138  }
139  }
140  map.data = data;
141 
142  // set map header
143  map.header.stamp = Time::now();
144  map.header.frame_id = "map";
145 
146  // set map meta data
147  map.info.map_load_time == Time::now();
148  map.info.resolution = resolution;
149  map.info.width = x;
150  map.info.height = y;
151 
152  // position of cell (0,0)
153  map.info.origin.position.x = xmin;
154  map.info.origin.position.y = ymin;
155 
156  map_exists = true;
157  }
158 
159  return map;
160 }
161 
162 bool area::get_map (nav_msgs::GetMap::Request &req, nav_msgs::GetMap::Response &res)
163 {
164  res.map = get_gridmap();
165  return true;
166 }

169 {
170  res.point = origin;
171  return true;

174 bool area::get_rotation (cpswarm_msgs::GetDouble::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::GetDouble::Response &res)
175 {
176  // get coordinates
177  geometry_msgs::Point pl, pb, pr;
178  pl.x = numeric_limits<double>::max();
179  pb.y = numeric_limits<double>::max();
180  pr.x = numeric_limits<double>::min();
181  for (auto p : coords) {
182  // left most point
183  if (p.x < pl.x || (p.x == pl.x && p.y < pl.y))
184  pl = p;
185 
186  // bottom most point
187  if (p.y < pb.y)
188  pb = p;
189 
190  // right most point
191  if (p.x > pr.x || (p.x == pr.x && p.y < pr.y))
192  pr = p;
193  }
194 
195  // no rotation required
196  if ((pl.x == pb.x && pl.y == pb.y) || (pr.x == pb.x && pr.y == pb.y))
197  return false;
198 
199  // rotate clockwise
200  if (pr.y < pl.y) {
201  res.value = -atan2(pr.y - pb.y, pr.x - pb.x);
202  }
203 
204  // rotate counter clockwise
205  else {
206  res.value = -atan2(pb.y - pl.y, pb.x - pl.x);
207  }
208 
209  return true;
210 }
211 
212 bool area::out_of_bounds (cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Request &req, cpswarm_msgs::OutOfBounds::Response &res)
213 {
214  // the winding number counter, i.e., how often a ray from the point to the right crosses the boundary
215  int wn = 0;
216 
217  // loop through all edges of the polygon
218  for (int i = 0; i < coords.size(); ++i) {
219  // ray crosses upward edge
220  if (coords[i].y <= req.pose.position.y && coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].y > req.pose.position.y && is_left(coords[i], coords[(i+1)%coords.size()], req.pose.position))
221  ++wn;
222 
223  // ray crosses downward edge
224  else if (coords[i].y > req.pose.position.y && coords[(i+1)%coords.size()].y <= req.pose.position.y && is_right(coords[i], coords[(i+1)%coords.size()], req.pose.position))
225  --wn;
226  }
227 
228  // pose is outside
229  if (wn == 0)
230  res.out = true;
231 
232  // pose is inside
233  else
234  res.out = false;
235 
236  return true;
237 }
238 
239 void area::init_area ()
240 {
241  // read area coordinates
242  vector<double> area_x;
243  vector<double> area_y;
244  nh.getParam(this_node::getName() + "/area_x", area_x);
245  nh.getParam(this_node::getName() + "/area_y", area_y);
246  if (map_exists == false && (area_x.size() != area_y.size() || area_x.size() < 3)) {
247  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Invalid area, it must contain at least three coordinates! Exiting...");
248  shutdown();
249  }
250  vector<pair<double,double>> raw_coords;
251  for (int i = 0; i < area_x.size(); ++i)
252  raw_coords.emplace_back(area_x[i], area_y[i]);
253 
254  // global positioning
255  string pos_type = "global";
256  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/pos_type", pos_type, pos_type);
257  bool global = pos_type == "local" ? false : true;
258  if (global) {
259  // service client for converting GPS to local coordinates
260  ServiceClient fix_to_pose_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::FixToPose>("gps/fix_to_pose");
261  ROS_DEBUG("Wait for fix_to_pose service...");
262  fix_to_pose_client.waitForExistence();
263  cpswarm_msgs::FixToPose f2p;
264 
265  // convert given area to local coordinates
266  for (int i = 0; i < raw_coords.size(); ++i) {
267  f2p.request.fix.longitude = raw_coords[i].first;
268  f2p.request.fix.latitude = raw_coords[i].second;
269  if (fix_to_pose_client.call(f2p)) {
270  coords.push_back(f2p.response.pose.pose.position);
271  }
272  else
273  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed to convert area bounds to local coordinates");
274  }
275 
276  // get origin from gps node
277  ServiceClient get_gps_origin_client = nh.serviceClient<cpswarm_msgs::GetGpsFix>("gps/get_gps_origin");
278  ROS_DEBUG("Wait for get_gps_origin service...");
279  get_gps_origin_client.waitForExistence();
280  cpswarm_msgs::GetGpsFix gpso;
281  if (get_gps_origin_client.call(gpso)) {
282  // convert origin to local coordinates
283  f2p.request.fix = gpso.response.fix;
284  if (fix_to_pose_client.call(f2p)) {
285  origin = f2p.response.pose.pose.position;
286  }
287  else
288  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed to convert origin to local coordinates");
289  }
290  else
291  ROS_FATAL("AREA_PROV - Failed get GPS coordinates of origin");
292  }
293 
294  // local positioning
295  else {
296  for (int i = 0; i < raw_coords.size(); ++i) {
297  // copy given area coordinates
298  geometry_msgs::Point p;
299  p.x = raw_coords[i].first;
300  p.y = raw_coords[i].second;
301  coords.push_back(p);
302  }
303 
304  // read origin from parameters
305  double x,y;
306  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/x", x, 0.0);
307  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/y", y, 0.0);
308  origin.x = x;
309  origin.y = y;
310  }
311 
312  // no coordinates given, extract from map
313  if (map_exists && coords.size() < 3) {
314  geometry_msgs::Point c;
315 
316  // bottom left
317  c = map.info.origin.position;
318  coords.push_back(c);
319 
320  // bottom right
321  c.x += map.info.width * map.info.resolution;
322  coords.push_back(c);
323 
324  // top right
325  c.y += map.info.height * map.info.resolution;
326  coords.push_back(c);
327 
328  // top left
329  c.x = map.info.origin.position.x;
330  coords.push_back(c);
331  }
332 
333  // publish grid map
334  map_publisher.publish(get_gridmap());
335 }
336 
337 bool area::is_left (geometry_msgs::Point p0, geometry_msgs::Point p1, geometry_msgs::Point p2)
338 {
339  // >0 for p2 left of the line through p0 and p1
340  // =0 for p2 on the line
341  // <0 for p2 right of the line
342  return ((p1.x - p0.x) * (p2.y - p0.y) - (p2.x - p0.x) * (p1.y - p0.y)) > 0;
343 }
344 
345 bool area::is_right (geometry_msgs::Point p0, geometry_msgs::Point p1, geometry_msgs::Point p2)
346 {
347  // >0 for p2 left of the line through p0 and p1
348  // =0 for p2 on the line
349  // <0 for p2 right of the line
350  return ((p1.x - p0.x) * (p2.y - p0.y) - (p2.x - p0.x) * (p1.y - p0.y)) < 0;
351 }
352 
353 void area::map_callback (const nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid::ConstPtr& msg)
354 {
355  // store map
356  map = *msg;
357  map_exists = true;
358 
359  // use only initial map
360  map_subscriber.shutdown();
361 
362  // initialize area coordinates
363  init_area();
364 }
